title: MediaX — Gallery Viewer
summary: Local-first, high-performance media viewer with tagging, search, and non-destructive edits.

title: MediaX — Dedup Engine
summary: Content-aware deduplication: cryptographic + perceptual hashing, batch triage, quarantine.

title: OCR Powerhouse
summary: PaddleOCR + ONNX + TensorRT stack with gRPC/REST bindings, Dockerized for GPUs.
